title.value: ISBT 128 Standard Terminology for Medical Products of Human Origin Product Description Codes

name.value: ICCBBA; P.O. Box 11309, San Bernardino, CA 92374, United States

description.value: The ISBT 128 Standard provides for the identification, terminology, coding, labeling, and data exchange for medical products of human origin. ISBT 128 Product Description Codes (PDCs) are associated with product descriptions in the ISBT 128 PDC Database based on standardized terminology. The ISBT 128 PDC Database is an international database protected by copyright that contains PDCs that may not apply to all countries. Note that the existence of a PDC does not imply that a product is acceptable to produce and distribute in your region. It is the responsibility of the user to observe national regulations, guidelines, and standards. For more information, see [https://www.isbt128.org/uri/productdescriptioncode](https://www.isbt128.org/uri/productdescriptioncode).
